summary: E-commerce shop application with Internet Identity authentication and Principal-based admin system
architectural_notes: Uses Internet Identity for authentication with Principal-based access control
Admin privileges controlled by Principal ID registration
Shop branding settings require admin authorization
known_issues: Admin Principal system not properly configured - users cannot set shop branding
No Principal is currently registered as admin in the system
Admin check logic may need first-user auto-registration or manual Principal addition

new_feature_requests.summary: Modify the backend to automatically register the first authenticated user's Principal as an admin when no admins exist in the system
Ensure the isAdmin check in the backend properly validates the caller's Principal against the adminPrincipals set before allowing shop branding operations
Add debug logging in the backend to trace Principal authentication flow and admin authorization checks for troubleshooting

projectName: Fix admin Principal registration and authorization system
